import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {FontAwesomeIcon} from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import {faCalendar, faCirclePlus,faMagnifyingGlass} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import TextComponent from "./TextComponent"; import Filter from "./filter"; function HomePage() { const [data1, setData] = useState([]) const [data2,setData2]=useState([]) const fetchData= async () =>{ try{ const response= await fetch('http://localhost:8000/data1') const json= await response.json() console.log("data1",data1) setData(json) setData2(json) }catch (err) { console.log(err) } } const handleFilterValue = (value) => { console.log('Filter value:', value); }; useEffect(()=>{ fetchData() },[]) return ( <>

Tüm Etkinlikler Tiyatro Konser Stand Up Sinema Çocuk
{/* FİLTER START

Etkinlik Tarihi
*/}

{data1?.map((x)=>

{x.date}

{x.name}

{x.location}

)}
) } export default HomePage
